random.line: What are you doing out here?
I'm playing in the plains! It's so windy here, I almost lost my Frisbee.
I've got ten apples in my basket. Two more and I'll have a dozen.
It's the start to a poem I'm thinking up. I'm going to be a famous poet when I grow up.
I'd try a little harder if I were you. There are some real good poets out there.
